item.title: Jaime add a quote by Toni Morrison, Beloved
item.description: "Love is or it ain't. Thin love ain't love at all" -- Toni Morrison, Beloved

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "A man is but the product of his thoughts. What he thinks, he becomes." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Jiddu Krishnamurti
item.description: "Tradition becomes our security, and when the mind is secure it is in decay." -- Jiddu Krishnamurti

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Jaime add a quote by bell hooks
item.description: "When we drop fear, we can draw nearer to people, we can draw nearer to the earth, we can draw nearer to all the heavenly creatures that surround us." -- bell hooks

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Jaime add a quote by John Milton
item.description: "The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven.." -- John Milton
